data.name: Commercial Loan
data.description: Borrow for any worthwhile purpose including property and asset purchases, business growth, refinance and debt consolidation

features.additionalInfo: You can self-serve your day-to-day banking needs via Bank Australia's App or Internet Banking.
Flexible Repayments: Interest Only Options avalailable. Margin may apply
Flexible Repayments: Make your loan repayments weekly, fortnightly or monthly. Additional Payments welcome.
Progressive drawdown of funds: You can draw down the funds you need, as you need it. Fee's may apply.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Natural Person or In trust for a Natural Person or Non-Individual entity
Available to customers carrying on an enterprise or activities done in the form of a business.
Applications for loans are subject to the Bank's lending criteria.
Business must be registered in Australia

fees.name: Quantity Surveyor Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when a Quantity Surveyor is required.

fees.name: Portability Fee- New Mortgage
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you request that a property securing a loan is replaced with a property that is a new security to Bank Australia. Additional Valuation costs may apply.

fees.name: Portability Fee- Existing Mortgage
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when a property securing a loan is replaced with a property that is already registered with a Bank Australia mortgage.

fees.name: Progress Draw Fee
fees.additionalInfo: A fee may apply per profressive draw down. Please contact Bank Australia for more information.

fees.name: Valuation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: A valuation fee will apply. The fee's vary based on the property being valued.

fees.name: Establishment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: The establishment fee is caluclated at 0.5% of the borrowing amount. Other fees may apply.

fees.name: Mortgage Discharge Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you request Bank Australia to arrange for the registration of discharge or Bank Australia is required to attend settlement. It covers preparation of the discharge of mortgage form. Statutory government registration fees will still apply. Additional fees may apply and should be paid direct to our agent if settlement is requested in a location other than a Bank Australia office. Additional Solicitor Fees may apply.

fees.name: Solicitor Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Certain applications for commercial credit require the use of a solicitor to facilitate. Additional fee's will apply and are payable to the solicitor used by Bank Australia. Please contact us for more information

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Secured. Repayment Type Principal and Interest.
Secured. Repayment Type Principal and Interest.

Secured. Repayment Type Principal and Interest.
